flawed_nl_solution:
Viviana has 25+5 = <<25+5=30>>30 chocolate chips.
Susana has 3/4*20 = <<3/4*20=51>>51 Vanilla chips.
They have 30+25 = <<30+25=55>>55 chocolate chips together.
Together they have 20+51 = <<20+51=71>>71 vanilla chips.
Together they have 71+55 = <<71+55=126>>126 chips

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
